items.py¶

class anduryl.ui.items.ItemsWidget(mainwindow)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QFrame

Widget with the items table

add_item()[source]¶

Add item button clicked. Adds an item to the project and updates the UI accordingly

construct_widget()[source]¶

Construct the UI widget

contextMenuEvent(event)[source]¶

Describes the context menu for the items widget, and handles the clicked action

eventFilter(source, event)[source]¶

Eventfilter for copying table content.

exclude_item_clicked()[source]¶

Function that checks whether an item is selected when the option “exclude item” is clicked.

remove_item(itemid)[source]¶

Removes an item form the project and updates the UI accordingly.

Parameters

itemid (str) – Item id

remove_item_clicked()[source]¶

Function that checks whether an item is selected when the option “remove item” is clicked.

to_csv()[source]¶

Calls the anduryl.io.table_to_csv function for the table model

toggle_item(item)[source]¶

Executed when the checkbox before an item is clicked. The item is added or removed to the excluded list of the items class.

Parameters

item (str) – Item id
